2020LET4JULY for 25% off monthly from our DediSeedbox F19-MDS-12T, making it only 30€ a month :O

Recurring and permanent discount, but only for monthly subscription.

F19-MDS-12T: 4x3TB RAID0, 1Gbps DediSeedbox - 29.99€ monthly

Server is 6core opteron, 24GB RAM (minimum, some are 48GB), 1Gbps 100TB or with increased service level Unmetered. NO SUDO/ROOT without upgraded service level, this is primarily meant as seedbox. You can upgrade for root access, see the service page for details. Only 3 servers are available
